data.text: Na Hiob buaa sɛ,
“Sɛ wɔbɛtumi akari mʼawerɛhodie
anka emu bɛyɛ duru asene anwea a ɛwɔ ɛpo mu nyinaa,
Otumfoɔ agyan no awɔ me mu,
Wiram afunumu su wɔ ɛberɛ a wanya ɛserɛ anaa,
Wɔdi aduane a nkyene nni mu anaa,
Mempɛ sɛ mede me nsa ka;
“Ao sɛ me nsa bɛka mʼabisadeɛ,
Mepɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn dwerɛ me,
ɛnneɛ anka mɛkɔ so anya saa awerɛkyekyerɛ yi.
“Ahoɔden bɛn na mewɔ a enti ɛsɛ sɛ menya anidasoɔ?
Mewɔ ahoɔden sɛ ɛboɔ anaa?
Mewɔ tumi a mede bɛboa me ho anaa?
“Deɛ nʼanidasoɔ asa no hia ne nnamfonom mpaeɛbɔ,
Nanso ahotosoɔ nni me nuanom mu. Wɔte sɛ nsuwa nsuwa a ɛyirie na ɛweɛ,
ɛberɛ a sukyerɛmma renane
nanso owiaberɛ mu no, ɛntene bio
Akwantufoɔ mane firi wɔn akwan so;
Tema akwantufoɔ hwehwɛ nsuo,
Wɔn ho yera wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔwɔ awerɛhyɛmu;
Afei wo nso woakyerɛ sɛ wo ho nni mfasoɔ;
Maka sɛ, ‘Momma me biribi?
anaasɛ monnye me mfiri mʼatamfoɔ nsam,
“Monkyerɛkyerɛ me, na mɛyɛ komm;
Nokorɛka yɛ yea,
Mokyerɛ sɛ deɛ maka no nnyɛ nokorɛ,
Mpo mobɛbɔ awisiaa so ntonto,
“Afei momfa ahummɔborɔ nhwɛ me.
Monto mo bo ase, mommu ntɛnkyea;
Amumuyɛsɛm wɔ mʼano anaa?
